creator: Crystal Missions
descriptionHtml:
CH Radio is an easy and elegant internet streaming service for Swiss radios. It provides many useful features - music information, sleep timer, radio alarm with chosen Swiss radio station, and much more. Try CH Radio, maybe you've just finally found the most suitable streaming application for you!

We gladly introduce you to an easy and elegant application, with which you can listen to your favorite Swiss radios - all you need is access to the internet. CH Radio offers a possibility to listen in high, but also in a low quality, which allows listening to users with slower internet connection as well.

You can easily mark and sort your favorite Swiss radio among all the others and switch between favourites even faster. Moreover, you can find here information about the currently playing song, so you will never miss its name again. You can even listen to music from this app on devices (speakers, TV, ..) connected to Chromecast.

Have you already been tired of the same alarm sound, beeping every morning? You can use CH Radio also this way! Just choose your favourite Swiss radio station and time, when alarm should be triggered and wake up every sunrise to a different music. In case you loose access to the internet over night, don't worry, application will wake you up with the default tone of you smartphone. On the other hand, if you like to fall asleep while listening to some music, but you don't want to leave it playing whole night, you can easily set it to shut down automatically after the chosen time.

CH Radio does not store any of the streams provided in the application, nor modify them in any way, as it is not the owner of any stream. Application only groups Swiss radios together and provide them to its end users in a comfortable way.

If you want to have some other Swiss radio in this application, or in case of any problem or idea, feel free to contact us via email: support@crystalmissions.com
descriptionShort: Fastest application for online streaming of Swiss radio stations.

title: CH Radio - Swiss Online Radios

container.value:
Crystal Missions, s. r. o.
Karola Salvu 1985/9
03401, Ružomberok
Slovakia

creator: Crystal Missions
descriptionHtml:
CH Radio is an easy and elegant internet streaming service for Swiss radios. It provides many useful features - music information, sleep timer, radio alarm with chosen Swiss radio station, and much more. Try CH Radio, maybe you've just finally found the most suitable streaming application for you!

We gladly introduce you to an easy and elegant application, with which you can listen to your favorite Swiss radios - all you need is access to the internet. CH Radio offers a possibility to listen in high, but also in a low quality, which allows listening to users with slower internet connection as well.

You can easily mark and sort your favorite Swiss radio among all the others and switch between favourites even faster. Moreover, you can find here information about the currently playing song, so you will never miss its name again. You can even listen to music from this app on devices (speakers, TV, ..) connected to Chromecast. CH Radio can be used in your car compatible with Android Auto as well.

Have you already been tired of the same alarm sound, beeping every morning? You can use CH Radio also this way! Just choose your favourite Swiss radio station and time, when alarm should be triggered and wake up every sunrise to a different music. In case you loose access to the internet over night, don't worry, application will wake you up with the default tone of you smartphone. On the other hand, if you like to fall asleep while listening to some music, but you don't want to leave it playing whole night, you can easily set it to shut down automatically after the chosen time.

CH Radio does not store any of the streams provided in the application, nor modify them in any way, as it is not the owner of any stream. Application only groups Swiss radios together and provide them to its end users in a comfortable way.

If you want to have some other Swiss radio in this application, or in case of any problem or idea, feel free to contact us via email: support@crystalmissions.com
descriptionShort: Fastest application for online streaming of Swiss radio stations.

We would like to hear your feedback! In case of any ideas or questions please let us know via email support@crystalmissions.com.

CH Radio offers a possibility to listen in high, but also in a low quality, which allows listening to users with slower internet connection as well. Moreover, you can adjust the sound the way you want with the integrated equalizer.

You can easily mark and sort your favorite Swiss radio among all the others and switch between favourites even faster. Moreover, you can find here information about the currently playing song, so you will never miss its name again. You can even listen to music from this app on devices (speakers, TV, ..) connected to Chromecast. CH Radio can be used in your car compatible with Android Auto as well.

Have you already been tired of the same alarm sound, beeping every morning? You can use CH Radio also this way! Just choose your favourite Swiss radio station and time, when alarm should be triggered and wake up every sunrise to a different music. In case you loose access to the internet over night, don't worry, application will wake you up with the default tone of you smartphone. On the other hand, if you like to fall asleep while listening to some music, but you don't want to leave it playing whole night, you can easily set it to shut down automatically after the chosen time.

CH Radio does not store any of the streams provided in the application, nor modify them in any way, as it is not the owner of any stream. Application only groups Swiss radios together and provide them to its end users in a comfortable way.

If you want to have some other Swiss radio in this application, or in case of any problem or idea, feel free to contact us via email: support@crystalmissions.com
descriptionShort: Fastest application for online streaming of Swiss radio stations.

CH Radio does not store any of the streams provided in the application, nor modify them in any way, as it is not the owner of any stream. Application only groups Swiss radios together and provide them to its end users in a comfortable way.

If you want to have some other Swiss radio in this application, or in case of any problem or idea, feel free to contact us via email: support@crystalmissions.com
